origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_financial_support', 'description': 'This function analyzes the financial support provided by policies to specific industries, focusing on the impact on financing.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., green_finance, fiscal_stimulus.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze, e.g., environmental_protection, renewable_energy.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., impact_on_financing, policy_effectiveness.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'The results of the analysis on how financial policies support the specified industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_financial_support, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'green_finance', 'industry'是'environmental_protection', 'analysisType'是'impact_on_financing'.
